data.title: Panasonic Lumix S PRO 70-200mm f/4 Lens for Leica L
data.Desc: Being an f/4 lens, it is small and lighter than most 70-200 lenses which is fine for me as a wedding photographer. This lens delivers sharp images with amazing bokeh at f/4.

data.title: Fujifilm XF 50mm f/2 WR Lens, Black
data.Desc: The 50mm f/2 is my favouite Fujifilm portrait lens. It's super lightweight, weather sealed and produces beautiful creamy bokeh. The 50mm f/2 pretty much comes with me at all times and I also love using it as a street photography lens.
